quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.   – Zig Ziglar
fact: This common everyday occurrence composed of 59% nitrogen, 21% hydrogen, and 9% dioxide is called a `fart`.
joke: Scientists finally did a study on forks. It's about tine!
